Fields.Name: TcpHits
Fields.Description: Number of TCP packets that hit the rule

Fields.Name: UdpHits
Fields.Description: Number of UDP packets that hit the rule

Fields.Name: IcmpHits
Fields.Description: Number of ICMP packets that hit the rule

Fields.Name: EspHits
Fields.Description: Number of ESP packets that hit the rule

Fields.Name: OtherHits
Fields.Description: Number of non-TCP/UDP/ICMP/ESP packets that hit the rule

Fields.Name: TotalHits
Fields.Description: Number of total packets that hit the rule
